Question: dayta dahanchha kya haay؟
Answer: dayta ka dahanchha kmpywtr ki mymwry main dayta ko mnzam aur astwr karnay ka ayk tarykha hay takha is tak rsaiy aur mwsar andaza main hayra phyry ki jaskay۔yha ayk mntaky nmaindghy fraham krta hay keh aadad wa shmar ko kis tarah mnzam kya jata hay ، js sy mwsar astwryj ، bazayaft ، aur malwmat ki hayra phyry ki ajazat hawty haay۔ dayta dahanchay ko do aham zamrwn main drjha bndy kya jaskta haay: kdym aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aur jama dayta dahanchay۔ bnyady aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay: yeh bnyady haynprwghramngh zabanwn kay zaryaha fraham krdha blaks bldangh۔msaalwn main shaml hayn: antyjr: pori tadad (jysay ، 1 ، 2 ، 3) astwr krta haay۔ flwt: astwrza aasharyha aasharyha (jysay ، 3.14 ، 2.718)۔ chyryktr: ayk hi harf (jysay ، 'aay' ، 'by' ، 'sy' ko astwr krta haay۔) .bwlyn

Question: ayk saf aur mnslk fharst main kya frk haay؟
Answer: safwn aur lnkda fharstyn dono aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hain jo anasar kay mjmwawn ko astwr aur mnzam karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔taham ، woh apnay bnyady dahanchay ، mymwry kay antzaam aur karkrdghy ki khsawsayat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn۔safwn aur mnslk fharstwn kay mabyn klydy akhtlafat yeh hayn: dahanchha: srny: ayk srny mymwry ka ayk mtnazaaha blak hay jo ayk hi ksm kay anasar ko astwr krta haay۔ansarwn tak andayks ka astamal karty hoey rsaiy haasal ki jati hay ، tkhlyk kay wkt taay shuda saiza ka tayn kya jata haay۔safwn ki ayk mkrrha lmbaiy hawty hay aur un kay asharyha ki bnyad par anasar tak braha rast rsaiy fraham krty haay۔ lnkda fharst: ayk lnkda fharst nwdas par mushtamil hawty hay jahan hr nwda main trtyb main aghlay nwda kay liye ayk kdr aur hawalha (ya pwaintr) hawta haay۔nwdas zurwry tawr par mymwry kay mtzuad mkamat par mhafwza nahin hawtay hain ، js sy mthark mymwry ki mkhtsa karnay ki ajazat hawty haay۔mnslk fharstyn lmbaiy main mkhtlf hawskty hain aur anasar tak trtyb tak rsaiy fraham krskty hayn۔ mymwry mynjmnt: srny: safwn ko tamam anasar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mymwry ka pehlay sy mkhtsa blak ki zurwrt hawty haay۔srny ka saiza taay hay aur isy aasany sy tbdyl nahin kya jaskta

Question: ayk astyk ktaar sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: ayk astyk aur ktaar dono lkyry dayta dahanchay hain jo anasar ko zakhyrha karnay aur un main hayra phyry kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔taham ، woh is trtyb kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hain js main anasar tak rsaiy aur hata diya jata haay۔yhaan astyk aur ayk ktaar kay darmiyan klydy akhtlafat hayn: astyk: aakhry un pehli aaؤt (LIFO): ayk astyk main ، aakhry ansar jo shaml kya jata hay (dhka diya jata haay) pehlay hi hataya jata hay (papda)۔as kay baray main plytwn kay astyk ki tarah swchiay ، jahan aap sirf upar sy plytwn ko shaml ya hata saktay hayn۔as ko hataiay baghair sab sy upar ka ansar۔ msaal kay tawr pr: ktabwn kay dahyr par ghwr kryn۔aakhry ktab sab sy upar rakhi hogi hay

Question: haysh tybl kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ayk haysh tybl ، jsay haysh myp kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay kam fraham krta haay۔as main hayshngh namy ayk tknyk astamal ki hogi hay takha woh apni chabyan par mbny anasar ko zakhyrha karain aur bazayaft kryn۔ayk haysh tybl main baltywn ya slatwn ki ayk saf shaml hawty hay ، jahan hr slat ayk ya zayada klydy kdr kay jwraay ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔ haysh tybl kis tarah kam krta haay: haysh fnkshn: ayk haysh fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk klyd lyta hay aur haysh kwda ki ghnty krta hay ،ayk add kymt haay۔haysh kwda ka astamal andayks ya balty ka tayn karnay kay liye kya jata hay jahan mtalkha klydy kdr ki jwray hogi

Question: drkhtwn ka dayta dahanchha kya hay aur is ki mkhtlf aksam kya hayn؟
Answer: ayk drkht ayk nan lainr dayta dahanchha hay jo mnslk ، aysaiklk andaza main drjha bndy sy anasar ko mnzam krta haay۔as main nwdas aur knarwn par mushtamil hay ، jahan nwdas anasar ki nmaindghy karty hain ، aur knaray anasar kay mabyn talkat ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ksy drkht main sab sy upar waly nwda ko rwt nwda kaha jata hay ، aur hr nwda main safr ya is sy zayada bchwn kay nwdas hawsktay hayn۔nwdas jn main ayk hi waldyn kay nwda hawtay hain inhain bhan bhaiy kehty hain ، aur baghair kesi bchay kay nwdas kay nwda ko pty ka nwda kaha jata haay۔ yahan mkhtlf ksm kay drkht hayn: bainry try: ayk bainry try ayk drkht hay js main hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchwn kay nwdas hawtay hayn۔، baien bchay aur dien bchay kay tawr par jana jata haay۔js trtyb main bchwn kay nwdas ka ahatmam kya jata hay woh bainry drkht ki khsawsayat ko mtasar krskta hay ، jesay bainry srch try ، aaywl try ، ya dahyr۔ bainry srch try (by ays ty): bainry srch try bainry drkht ki ayk ksm hay js mynnwda kay baien bchay main nwda sy kam akdar hawty hain ، aur dien bchay main nwda sy zayada akdar hawty hayn۔yha mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn ko kabl bnata hay ، is kay sath

Question: aap trtyb shuda saf main bainry srch alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: ayk trtyb shuda saf par bainry srch alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: baltrtyb baien aur dien pwaintrza ko saf kay aaghaza aur akhttam par syt kryn۔ jab baien pwaintr dien pwaintr sy kam ya is kay brabr hay ، dharaiyn۔mndrjha zayl akdamat: a.drmyany andayks ka hasab baien aur dien pwaintrza ki awsta kay tawr par kryn: wsta = (baiyn + daiyn) / 2.b.mdal andayks ki kymt ko hadf ki kymt kay sath mwazanha kryn: agar drmyany kymt hadf kay brabr hay tou ، mdal andayks ko ntyjha kay tawr par waps kryn۔ agar drmyany kymt hadf sy zayada hay tou ، dien pwaintr ko wsta main ap dayt karain - 1.ifdrmyany kymt hadf sy kam hay ، baien pwaintr ko mda + par ap dayt kryn۔

Question: try dayta dahanchha kya hay aur yeh kesay mfyd haay؟
Answer: ayk traiy ، jsay ayk sabkha drkht bhi kaha jata hay ، drkhtwn ki tarah ka dayta dahanchha hay jo tar kay tawr par zakhyrha shuda chabyan ki mwsar bazayaft kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha khasa tawr par mtalkha msail ko hal karnay kay liye mfyd hay

Question: jab aap hayp dayta dahanchha astamal karain ghay؟
Answer: ayk hayp dayta dahanchha aam tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal hawta hay js main trjyhay ktaarwn kay mwsar antzaam ki zurwrt hawty hay ya zayada sy zayada ya kam sy kam ansar jld tlash karna hawta haay۔yhaan kuch aysay haalat hain jahan hayp dayta ka dahanchha khasa tawr par mfyd haay: trjyhay ktaar: trjyhay ktaar ko mwsar andaza main nafza karnay kay liye dahyr ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔trjyhay ktaar main ، anasar ki trjyhaat sy wabstha hain ، aur sab sy zayada (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar hamyshha ktaar kay samnay rhata haay۔dahyr par mbny trjyhay ktaar mwsar wkt (O (1)) ya lwghrthmk wkt (O (lagh (lagh (lagh (lagh (O (lagh (O (1)) main mwjwdha aaly (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar ki mwsar azuafay ، sab sy zayada (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar ko khtm karnay ، aur mwjwdha aaly (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar ki bazayaft ki ajazat dyty haay۔n)). chhant raha haay: haypswrt ayk jghha main ayk mwsar jghha chhntaiy karnay wala alghwrthm hay jo dahyr ka astamal krta haay۔yha un pt srny sy zayada sy zayada hayp (chrahaiy kay aardar kay liay) ya ayk kam hayp (nzawl aardar kay liay) bna kar aur dahyr sy zayada sy zayada (ya kam sy km) ansar ko bar bar nkal kar kam krta haay۔haypswrt main O (n lagh ayn) ki wkt ki pychydghy hawty hay aur yeh khasa tawr par mfyd hay

Question: mthark prwghramngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mthark prwghramngh ayk msilay ko hal karnay ki ayk tknyk hay jo pychydha msail ko hal karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay takha un ko twra daalyn aur sirf ayk bar hr zayly msail ko hal kya jaskay۔yha awwrlypngh astrkchrza kay sath msail ko mwsar hal karnay ، bay kar kmpywtwn ko khtm karnay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ mthark prwghramngh kay pychhay klydy khyal yeh hay keh chhwtay chhwtay prwblwn ko hal krkay aur braay msilay kay hal kay l these un zayly prwblwn kay hal ka astamal kryn۔zayly msail kay hal aam tawr par kesi tybl ya mymwizayshn srny main mhafwza kyay jatay hain ، js sy aasany sy tlash aur dwbarha astamal ki jaskty haay۔ daainymk prwghramngh main drj zayl akdamat shaml hayn: msilha ki nshandhay kryn: msilay ko smjhyn aur is bat ka tayn karain keh aya yeh mthark prwghramngh kay liye mwzawn khsawsayat ki nmaish krta haay۔an msail jn main zayada sy zayada sakht aur awwrlypngh sab prwblwbl shaml hain woh mthark prwghramngh kay liye achhay amydwar hayn۔ tkrar kay rshtay ko tshkyl dyn: msilay ko chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra dyn aur is kay lhaaza sy braay msilay kay hal ka azahaar karain

Question: chwraaiy ki pehli aur ghharaiy ki pehli tlash kay mabyn akhtlafat ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) aur ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) do mshhawr ghraf trywrsl alghwrthm hain jo nwdas ko tlash karnay ya tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain

Question: yaddasht kya hay aur mthark prwghramngh main is ka astamal kis tarah hawta haay؟
Answer: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mthark prwghramngh main astamal hawty hay takha mhanghay fnkshn kalwn ki ghnty ko bhatr bnanay kay liye un kay ntaij ko bhatr bnaya jaskay aur jab wahi un pt dwbarha hawta hay tou un ko dwbarha astamal karty hoey un ka dwbarha astamal karty hayn۔as main aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay main fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karna shaml hay ، aam tawr par kesi srny ya haysh tybl main ، takha isi aadanwn kay sath bad main aanay wali kalyn is ko dwbarha tshkyl denay kay bjaiay braha rast pyshghy ntyjha bazayaft krskyn۔ mthark prwghramngh kay tnazar main ، mymwraizayshn aam tawr par hawty haay۔recursive alghwrthm kay sath astamal kya jata hay jo awwrlypngh ki nmaish karty hain

Question: kya aap wzuahat krsktay hain keh srkh rngh ka drkht kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ykyna!ayk srkh rngh ka drkht ayk khud mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay jo khsawsayat kay ayk syt ko nafza krkay twazan ko brkrar rkhta haay۔as ka nam drkht main hr nwda ko tfwyzu krdha rngh kay nam par rakha gaya haay: srkh ya syaha۔srkh rngh kay drkht ki khsawsayat mndrjha zayl hayn: hr nwda ya tou srkh ya syaha hawta haay۔ jra ka nwda hamyshha syaha hawta haay۔ hr pty (kal) nwda syaha haay۔ agar nwda srkh hay tou ، is kay dono bchay syaha hayn۔ hr rastha۔nwda sy is ki awlad pty nwdas main syaha nwdas ki msawy tadad hawty haay۔as praprty ko blyk awnchaiy praprty ya blyk bylns kaha jata haay۔ un khsawsayat par aml pyra hony kay bad ، ayk srkh rngh ka drkht is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh jra sy kesi bhi ptay tak ka lmba trien rastha mkhtsar trien rastay ki lmbaiy sy dwghna nahin hawta hay ، js kay ntyjay main mtwazan hawta haay۔drkht۔ srkh rngh kay drkht par ki janay wali karwaiyan ، jesay andraj aur hazaf karna ، ko brkrar rkhna shaml hay

Question: trjyhay ktaar kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: trjyhay ktaar ayk tjrydy dayta ki ksm hay jo anasar ka mjmwaha mhafwza krty hay ، hr ayk trjyha sy wabstha haay۔trjyha mjmwaha kay andr kesi ansar ki nsbt ki ahamyt ya ajlt ki nshandhay krty haay۔aaly trjyha kay haaml anasar ko zayada aham smjha jata hay aur kam trjyha waly anasar sy pehlay bazayaft ya is par karrwaiy ki jati haay۔ trjyhay ktaar kay zaryaha taawn yaftha aham karwaiyan yeh hayn: andraj: ansar ki trjyha ki bnyad par aardar ko brkrar rkhtay hoey trjyhay ktaar main ansar shaml krta haay۔nya ansar mnasb pwzayshn main rakha gaya hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh aaly trjyha kay haaml anasar ktaar kay samnay kay kryb hayn۔ lalch: yeh ansar ko trjyhay ktaar sy aaly trjyha kay sath hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔sb sy zayada kay sath ansar

Question: aap blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: blbla trtyb wala alghwrthm ayk sadha chhantnay wala alghwrthm hay jo bar bar fharst main kdm rkhta hay ، mlhakha anasar ka mwazanha krta hay ، aur agar woh ghalat trtyb main hain tou un ko tbdyl krta haay۔as aml ko is wkt tak dharaya jata hay jab tak keh fharst trtyb nah di jaye

Question: akyla aur dwghna mnslk fharst main kya frk haay؟
Answer: ayk wahad mnslk fharst aur dwghna mnslk fharst kay darmiyan bnyady frk hr nwda kay pas mwjwd hawalwn ki tadad main haay۔an dono ka mwazanha yahan haay: akylay lnkda lst: wahad mnslk fharst main hr nwda main do fyldaza shaml hawtay hayn: fharst main aghlay nwda ka dayta aur ayk hawalha (ya pwaintr)۔ nwdas ghair mstkym andaza main jraay hoey hain ، jahan hr nwda pwaintsaghlay nwda pr۔ aakhry nwda

Question: haysh tybl main kesi ansar ki tlash main wkt ki pychydghy kya haay؟
Answer: haysh tybl main kesi ansar ki tlash main wkt ki pychydghy ka anhasaar mkhsawsa nfaza aur tsaadm ki mwjwdghy par hawta haay۔awsta sawrt main ، ayk achhy tarah sy tksym shuda haysh fnkshn aur kam bwjh ansar kay sath ، haysh tybl main tlash karnay ki wkt ki pychydghy O (1) ، ya mstkl wkt haay۔ yahan tlash karna ayk khraby hay keh aam tawr par haysh tybl main kis tarah kam krta haay:js ansar ki tlash ki jaye is ki klyd haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey haysh ki jati haay۔haysh fnkshn haysh tybl kay bnyady srny dahanchay main andayks ki klyd ka nkshha bnata haay۔ agar koi tsaadm nahin hawta hay (yany mtadd chabyan

Question: srklr bfr kya hay aur is kay kya fwaid hayn؟
Answer: ayk srklr bfr ، jsay srklr ktaar ya rngh bfr bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk mkrrha saiza kay bfr ko srklr kay tawr par astamal krta haay۔

Question: mtwazan srch drkht main sst lwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mtwazan tlash kay drkhtwn kay tnazar main ، sst lwdangh sy mrad ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan nwda kay aadad wa shmar ya kdr ki asal ghnty ya bazayaft is wkt tak mwkhr krdy jati hay jab tak keh is ki wazuha tawr par drkhwast nah ki jaiay۔tamyr ya azuafay kay doran drkht main tamam nwdas kay liye akdar ko pysh karnay aur zakhyrha karnay kay bjaiay ، akdar sirf is wkt bhry hui ya hasab ki jati hain jab zurwry haw۔ lyzay lwdangh khasa tawr par mnzarnamwn main mfyd saabt hawskty hay jahan nwda ki kymt ki ghnty ya bazayaft mhangha ya wsail haay۔ghharyjb tak is ki zurwrt nah ho is wkt tak lwdangh ko mwkhr karnay sy ، ghair zurwry kmpywtyshn ya bazayaftwn sy bcha jaskta hay ، mmknha tawr par wkt aur wsail ki bcht hawty haay۔ jab sst lwdangh ko mtwazan srch drkht par lghaya jata hay ، jesay AVL drkht ya srkh syaha drkht ، main nwdasdrkht aam tawr par asal kdr ko braha rast zakhyrha karnay kay bjaiay klyd aur kdr kay hawalay sy zakhyrha krta haay۔nwda sy wabstha kdr sirf is wkt haasal ki jati hay ya is ki ghnty ki jati haay۔ yahan mtwazan srch drkht main sst lwdangh kay tsawr ko wazuha karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka mnzar haay: frzu kyj. hamary pas mtwazan srch try hay jo talbaa kay baray main malwmat ko mhafwza krta hay ، jahan hr nwda taalb alm ki nmaindghy krta haay۔awr taalb alm ki shnakht (klyd) aur taalb alm kay ghryda (wylyw) ko astwr krta haay۔ drkht ki tamyr karty wkt tamam talbaa kay drjat ko lwda karnay aur astwr karnay kay baray main ، hum sst lwdangh ka astamal karty hayn۔har ayk

Question: bainry tlash kay drkht sy aay wy ayl ka drkht kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: ayk AVL drkht ayk ksm ka khud twazan bainry srch try (BST) hay jo mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ayk mkhsawsa twazan ki haalt ko brkrar rkhta haay۔aay wy ayl kay drkht aur amwmy bainry tlash kay drkht kay darmiyan klydy frk bylns ansar aur is sy wabstha twazan kay aml main haay۔yhaan aham akhtlafat hayn: bylns fyktr: aay wy ayl kay drkht main hr nwda ayk bylns ansar ko zakhyrha krta hay ، jo is nwda kay baien aur dien sab trywn kay darmiyan awnchaiy ka frk haay۔bylns ansar -1 ، 0 ، ya 1 hawskta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya sab try baltrtyb baien bhary ، mtwazan ya dien bhary haay۔aam bainry srch try main ، twazan kay ansar ka koi tsawr nahin haay۔ mtwazan aapryshnza: jab bhi kesi AVL drkht main andraj ya hazaf karnay ka aml anjam diya jata hay jo twazan ki haalt main khll daalta hay (twazan ansar -2 ya +2 bn jata haay) ، mkhsawsa twazan ki karwaiyan hawty hayn۔twazan ko bhaal karnay kay liye mthark.an karrwaiywn main ghrdsh (snghl ya dabl

Question: blwm fltr kya hay aur is ka astamal kesay hawta haay؟
Answer: ayk blwm fltr ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo kesi syt main kesi ansar ki rknyt ko janchnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha mؤsar tarykay sy yeh taay krta hay keh aya kesi ansar ko syt main mwjwd hony ka amkan hay ya ykyny tawr par mwjwd nahin hay ، lekin yeh kabhi kbhar ghalat msabt ntaij pyda krskta hay (as bat ka asharha krta hay keh ansar mwjwd hawta hay jab yeh nahin hawta haay) ، haalankha yeh kabhi bhi ghalat mnfy pyda nahin krta hay (as bat ki nshandhay karty hain keh aykansar mwjwd nahin hawta hay jab yeh hawta haay) .yha hay keh blwm fltr kis tarah kam krta haay: abtda: ayk blwm fltr ayk mkrrha saiza bt srny (aam tawr par aym bts kay) aur K aazaad haysh fnkshn ka ayk syt kay sath tyar kya jata haay۔blwm fltr ka ansar ، yeh K haysh kay hr afaal ka astamal karty hoey haysh kya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main K mkhtlf haysh akdar hawty hayn۔bt srny main mtalkha bts haysh akdar kay zaryaha asharha krdha pwzayshnwn par 1 par syt kyay gaye hayn۔ mymbrshp tyst: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh ansar syt main hay ya nahin ، ansar ko isi kay haysh afaal ka astamal karty hoey haysh kya jata haay۔haysh akdar kay zaryaha asharha krdha pwzayshnwn par bt sray main bts ki janch ki jati haay۔aghr tamam mtalkha bts 1 par syt kyay gaye hain tou ، ansar par ghwr kya jata hay "

Question: amwraizada tjzayha kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: amwraizada tjzayha ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay par aapryshnza ki trtyb ki awsta wkt ki pychydghy ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، chahaay anfrady karrwaiywn main mkhtlf wkt ki pychydghyan hawskty hayn۔yha kamwn ki ayk syryza kay doran aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ya alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ki khsawsayat kay baray main zayada drst aur jama tfhaym fraham krta haay۔ kuch maamlat main ، aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay main kesi ayk aapryshn ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy nakarha hawskty hay ، lekin jab kesi trtyb par ghwr kryn۔karrwaiywn main ، awsta wkt ki pychydghy nmayan tawr par bhatr hawskty haay۔amwraizada tjzayha hamain mhanghay karrwaiywn kay akhrajat ko bray tadad main sstay kamwn par tksym krkay karrwaiywn ki mjmway laght ka tjzayha karnay main mdd krta haay۔ amwrtaizada tjzayha main tyn aham tarykay shaml hayn: mjmway tjzayha: yeh tarykha karwn ki trtyb ki kal laght ka tjzayha krta hay aur is ko tksym krta haay۔karrwaiywn ki tadad say۔yha fy aapryshn awsta laght par awpry pabnd fraham krta haay۔ hasab ktab ka tarykha: is tarykha kar main ، kuch aapryshnza

Question: jamd aur mthark saf main kya frk haay؟
Answer: jamd kay darmiyan frk

Question: aap anzumam ki trtyb alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: anzumam trtyb waly alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: tksym kryn: ghair trtyb shuda saf ko do hasawn main tksym kryn۔yha drmyany asharyha tlash krkay aur do alag alag sbrywn ki tshkyl kay zaryaha kya jaskta hay ، ayk shrwa sy wsta tak anasar par mushtamil hay ، aur dusra drmyany+1 sy aakhr tak anasar par mushtamil haay۔pchhlay mrhalay main tkhlyk krdha do sbrywn kw۔yha kdm sbrywn ko tksym karna jary rakhy ga jab tak keh hr sbry main sirf ayk ansar nah ho ، jsay pehlay hi trtyb diya jata haay۔yha do sbrywn kay anasar ka mwazanha krkay aur asal saf main rakhy janay waly chhwtay ansar ko mntkhb krkay kya jata haay۔as aml ko is wkt tak dharaiyn jab tak keh dono sbrywn kay tamam anasar ko asal saf main zum krdya nah jaiay۔ yahan

Question: askyp lst dayta ka dahanchha kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: askyp lst ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar ki trtyb shuda fharst main anasar ki tlash ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha ayk mnslk fharst ki tarah hay lekin is main mtadd mtwazay lnkda fharstyn shaml hain ، jn ko "staha" kaha jata hay ، jo tyzay sy tlash kay kamwn ki ajazat dyta haay۔askyp lstwn ko fraham karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay

Question: ayk lahakha drkht kya hay aur yeh kesay mfyd haay؟
Answer: ayk lahakha drkht ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ko mwsar andaza main nmaindghy krta haay۔yha bnyady tawr par pytrn mmasal aur strngh srch aapryshnza kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayk lahakha drkht khasa tawr par un ayply kyshnza main mfyd hay js main braay mtn ya day ayn aay ki trtyb ka tjzayha karna shaml haay۔ yahan ayk lahakha drkht kis tarah kam krta haay: tamyr: lahakha drkht ki tamyr kay liye ، dyiay gaye tar ko krdar kay lhaaza sy prwss kya jata haay۔tar ka hr lahakha drkht main ayk alyhadha rastay kay tawr par shaml kya jata haay۔lahakha jo mshtrkha sabkha main shryk hain isi raha main shryk hain jab tak keh woh daaiywrj۔ nwdas aur knarwn: drkht

Question: bainry srch try main ansar dakhl karnay ki wkt ki pychydghy kya haay؟
Answer: bainry srch try (by ays ty) main kesi ansar ko dakhl karnay ki wkt ki pychydghy drkht ki sakht par mnhasar haay۔bhatryn sawrthaal main ، jahan drkht mtwazan hay ، wkt ki pychydghy O (lagh ayn) hay ، jahan N drkht main nwdas ki tadad haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrthaal main ، jahan drkht anthaaiy mtwazan hay (lkyry lnkda fharst sy mshabhat) ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n) hawskty hay ، jahan drkht main nwdas ki tadad haay۔ is tghyr ki wjha yeh haaykha mtwazan by ays ty main ، drkht ki awnchaiy nwdas ki tadad kay slslay main lagh un ki rhaty hay ، js sy dakhlay kay mwsar kamwn ko ykyny bnaya jata haay۔mtwazan by ays ty main hr staha baky tlash ki jghha ko tkryba half nsaf tak tksym krta hay ، js ki wjha sy anasar ki mtwazan tksym hawty haay۔ dusri taraf ، ayk mtwazan by ays ty ayk lkyry dahanchay main haras daal sakta hay ، js main ayk sab try dusray sy nmayan tawr par braa haay۔as maamlay main ، kesi ansar ko dakhl karnay main drkht ki pori awnchaiy sy ghzarna shaml hawskta hay ، js kay ntyjay main ayk khtay wkt ki pychydghy hawty haay۔ mwsar azuafay ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ، khud twazan bainry tlash ka astamal karna aam haay۔

Question: kya aap wzuahat krsktay hain keh ayk fbwnyky hayp kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ayk fbwnyky hayp ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo trjyhay ktaar ko mwsar andaza main nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha bainry hayps ya bainwmyil hayps jesay trjyhay ktaar kay nfaza kay mkablay main bazu karrwaiywn kay liye bhatr amwraizada taim pychydghy fraham krta haay۔fybwnyky hayp ki klydy khsawsayat main is ki anzumam kay dahyr praprty aur mstkl wkt ki karrwaiywn jesay andraj aur kami ki salahayt shaml haay۔ yahan fybwnyky hayp kis tarah kam krta hay is ka ayk jaizaha: sakht: ayk fbwnyky hayp ka ayk mjmwaha haay۔drkhtwn ka hakm dya۔dahyr main hr drkht kam sy kam praprty ki pyrwy krta hay ، jahan hr nwda ki klyd is kay waldyn ki klyd sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawty haay۔drkhtwn ki koi shkl hawskty hay ، aur dahyr ki nmaindghy khud hi jra kay nwdas ki dwghna sy mnslk fharst kay zaryaha ki jati haay۔as kay bad is drkht ko jra ki fharst main shaml kya jata haay۔andraj kay aml main O (1) ki mstkl wkt ki pychydghy hawty hay kywnkha kesi zum ya tnzaym nw ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔km sy kam nwda hay

Question: khud twazan bainry tlash ka drkht kya hay aur aap isy kab astamal karain ghay؟
Answer: ayk khud twazan bainry srch try (by ays ty) ayk bainry srch try hay jo mwsar tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnanay kay l intrats dakhlwn aur hazaf hony kay doran khud bkhwd mtwazan dahanchay ko brkrar rkhty haay۔twazan ka tarykha kar drkhtwn kay nwdas ko ghair mtwazan dahanchay main anhataata ko rwknay kay liye dwbarha tksym krta hay ، jo ghair mwsar karrwaiywn ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ aam tawr par astamal hony waly khud twazan waly by ays ty main shaml hayn: aay wy ayl ka drkht: ayk aay wy ayl ka drkht awnchaiy sy mtwazan bainry tlash ka drkht hay ، jahan awnchaiy hay ، jahan awnchaiy haay۔ksy bhi nwda kay baien aur dien sbtyza zayada sy zayada 1 sy mkhtlf hayn۔ AVL drkht awnchaiy kay twazan ko brkrar rkhnay kay l rents azuafay aur hazafwn kay doran ghrdshyn anjam dy kar is twazan ko haasal karty hayn۔yha tlash kay l O O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy ko ykyny bnata hay ،

Question: aap kwikswrt alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: kwikswrt ayk mshhawr chhant raha alghwrthm hay jo tksym aur ftha karnay waly nktaha nzar ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha mhawr ansar ko mntkhb karnay ، mhawr kay ard ghrd saf ko tksym karnay ، aur mhawr kay dono taraf sbrywn ko bar bar trtyb denay sy kam krta haay۔yhaan kwiykstwrt alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay tarykwn ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat haay: tksym: saf sy mhawr ansar ka antkhab kryn۔mhawr ka antkhab alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krskta hay ، aur mhawr kay antkhab kay liye mkhtlf hakmt amly mwjwd hay (jysay ،

Question: ghraf dayta dahanchha kya hay aur is ki mkhtlf aksam kya hayn؟
Answer: ayk ghraf ayk dayta dahanchha hawta hay jo baham mrbwta nwdas kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jahan nwdas ko amwdy kaha jata hay ، aur un kay mabyn rabtawn ko knarwn kehty hayn۔

Question: ayk mnt kay dahyr aur myks hayp kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr kay darmiyan bnyady frk anasar aur un praprtyza ki trtyb main hay jo woh brkrar rkhtay hayn: mn dahyr: ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، is nwda ki kymt akdar sy kam ya is kay brabr haay۔as kay bchay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، kam sy kam kymt hamyshha dahyr ki jra main rhaty haay۔yha praprty is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh kam sy kam ansar ko dahyr sy mwsar andaza main bazayaft kya jaskta haay۔ myks hayp: kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، kymt

Question: aap ghraf par day ayf ays (ghharaiy ki pehli tlash) alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi ghraf par ghharaiy ki pehli tlash (DFS) alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap astyk ka astamal karty hoey ya kesi tkrar nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey kesi tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan astyk ka astamal karty hoey tkrary nktaha nzar ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat haay: nwdas ko dykhnay kay liye zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk astyk bnaiyn۔as ko shrwa karnay waly nwda kay sath shrwa kryn۔ mlahazaha karnay waly nwdas ka tryk rkhnay kay liye ayk syt ya saf tyar kryn۔ jab astyk khaly nahin haay: astyk sy ayk nwda pap kryn۔ chyk karain agar nwda pehlay hi mlahazaha kya gaya haay۔aghr aysa hay tou ، aghlay tkrar ko jary rkhyn۔ nwda ko mlahazaha karain aur is par karrwaiy kryn۔ mwjwdha nwda kay mlhakha tamam nwdas ko ghyt karain jn ka dwrha nahin kya gaya hay aur inhain astyk par dhkylyn۔azaghr main tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey day ayf ays alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf day ayf ays (ghraf ، astart_nwda): astyk = [astart_nwda] mlahazaha karain = syt ()

Question: yaddasht kya hay aur mthark prwghramngh main is ka astamal kis tarah hawta haay؟
Answer: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mthark prwghramngh main astamal hawty hay takha kesi fnkshn kay aml ko bhatr bnanay kay liye is kay ntaij ko bhatr bnaiay۔as main mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karna aur jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha hawta hay tou inhain kyshay sy bazayaft karna shaml hawta haay۔yaddasht pehlay kay hasab shuda ntaij ko dwbarha astamal krkay bay kar kmpywtwn ko khtm krty hay ، is tarah alghwrthm ki mjmway wkt ki pychydghy ko kam krty haay۔yha afaal kesi msilay ko bar bar chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra kar hal karty hayn۔taham ، yaddasht kay baghair ، ayk hi zayly msail ko mtadd bar hal kya jaskta hay ، js ki wjha sy ghair zurwry kmpywtwn ka sbb bnta haay۔ mthark prwghramngh main yaddasht ka astamal kya jata haay: tkrar karnay waly fnkshn ki shnakht kryn: ayk tkrar fnkshn ki tlash karain jo awwrlypngh sab prwblwblza ki praprty ko zaahar krta hay ، jahan ayk hi zayly prwblys ko zaahar krta haay۔mtadd bar hal kyay jatay hayn۔ ayk kyshay ko tyar kryn: aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ko shrwa karain ، jesay srny ya haysh tybl ، pehlay kmpywtda ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kyshay kay tawr par kam kryn۔kyshay ko un pt (ya aadanwn ka mjmwaha) un kay mtalkha aaؤt pt par nkshha bnanay kay kabl hona chahaiay۔ fnkshn ko tbdyl kryn: pehlay chyk karnay kay liye tkrar karnay wali tkryb main trmym karain keh aya dyiay gaye un pt ka ntyjha pehlay hi kyshay main mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔aghr aysa hawta hay tou ، kyshda ntyjha lwtaiyn

Question: dayjkstra ka alghwrthm kya hay aur is ka astamal kesay hawta haay؟
Answer: dajkstra ka alghwrthm ayk mkbwl alghwrthm hay jo ghair mnfy knaray kay wzan waly ghraf main nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha hadayt aur ghair hadayt shuda dono ghrafwn par kam krta hay aur ghraf kay dusray tamam nwdas tak ayk hi makhza nwda sy kam trien rastha tyar krta haay۔ alghwrthm hr nwda kay liye "ghyr mnhasar" nwdas aur "fasalay" ki kymt ka ayk syt brkrar rkhta hay ، abtdaiy tawr par anfynty par syt kya jata haay۔swaiay swrs nwda kay jo 0 par syt kya gaya haay۔yha aml is wkt tak jary hay jab tak keh tamam nwdas ka dwrha nah kya jaye ya mnzal ka nwda phancha nah jaiay۔ yahan dajkstra kay alghwrthm ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat: ghraf ko shrwa karain aur makhza nwda ka fasalha 0 aur dyghr tamam nwdas ko anfynty par syt kryn۔ayk trjyhay ktaar (jw aksar ayk mn dahyr kay tawr par nafza ki jati haay) nwdas ko un kay fasalwn ki bnyad par zakhyrha karnay kay liay۔makhza nwda dakhl karain

Question: kya aap AVL drkht aur srkh rngh kay drkht kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat krsktay hayn؟
Answer: aay wy ayl kay drkht aur srkh rngh kay dono drkht khud ko mtwazan karnay waly bainry tlash kay drkht hain jo drkht ki awnchaiy ko mtwazan rkhtay hoey mwsar karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnatay hayn۔taham ، un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat mwjwd hayn: twazan kay mayar: AVL drkht: ayk AVL drkht main ، hr nwda ka twazan ansar ، baien subtree mains ki awnchaiy kay tawr par byan kya jata hay ، dien sbtry ki awnchaiy ، ya tou -1 ، 0 hona chahaiay۔، ya 1. agar kesi bhi nwda ka twazan ansar is had sy bahar hawjata hay tou ، drkht ko ghrdsh ki karrwaiywn ko anjam dy kar twazan diya jata haay۔ ryda-blyk try: srkh rngh kay drkht main ، hr nwda ko rngh tfwyzu kya jata haay-ya tou srkh ya syaha۔drkht ko drj zayl khsawsayat ko pora karna chahaiay: hr nwda ya tou srkh ya syaha hawta haay۔ jra nwda syaha haay۔ hr pty nwda (nyl ya kal) syaha haay۔ agar nwda srkh hay tou ، is kay dono bchay syaha hayn۔

Question: rydaks drkht kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: ayk rydaks drkht ، jsay try ya pryfks try bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk khasa drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo mwsar astwryj aur tarwn ki bazayaft kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha khasa tawr par lght kay nfaza ، aatwmplyt sstm ، aur aai py rwtngh tyblza jesay ayply kyshnza kay liye mfyd haay۔ rydaks try apnay krdarwn kay zaryaha tarwn ka ahatmam krta hay ، js main hr nwda ayk sabkha ya mkml tar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh ayk rydaks try kis tarah kam krta haay: nwda dahanchha: rydaks try main hr nwda main kiy ajzaaa hawtay hayn: klydy/krdar: nwda sy wabstha krdar۔msaal kay tawr par ، lght kay nfaza main ، hr krdar kesi lfza main ayk khta ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ bchwn: bchwn kay nwdas kay asharay ya hawalha۔har bchha ayk mmknha krdar sy mtaabkt rkhta hay jo lfza markr kay mwjwdha nwda ki pyrwy krskta haay: ayk jhndaa js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya nwda ayk mkml lfza kay akhttam ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ rydaks try ki tamyr: rydaks ka drkht abtdaiy tawr par khaly hay ، js main sirf ayk jra nwda haay۔chwnkha drkht main dawr daalay jatay hain ، harwf ko baien sy dien tak abwr kya jata haay۔ dakhlha aapryshn: rydaks try main ayk tar dakhl krna: jra nwda par shrwa kryn۔ chyk karain agar mwjwdha krdar mwjwdha nwda kay bchay ki tarah mwjwd haay۔krta hay ، mntkl

Question: by try kya hay aur yeh bainry srch kay drkht sy kesay mkhtlf haay؟
Answer: by try ayk khud twazan rkhnay wala drkht dayta dahanchha hay jo dask par ya saanwy astwryj main bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔yha sst rsaiy kay awkat kay sath nzaamwn kay l optim bhatr hay ، jesay haarda daraiywza ، jahan kam sy kam dask rydaza karkrdghy kay liye bohat zurwry haay۔ayk by try bainry srch try (by ays ty) sy kiy tarykwn sy mkhtlf haay: nwda dahanchha: bainry srch try main ، hr nwda main aam tawr par ayk hi klyd aur do bchwn kay pwaintr hawtay hain ، jo baien aur dien sbtryza ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔as kay braks ، by try nwda main mtadd chabyan aur bchwn kay pwaintrza shaml hawsktay hayn۔nwda main chabyan ki tadad ayk khasa had kay andr hay ، js ka tayn by try kay hakm sy hawta haay۔by try ka trtyb nwda main ajazat di hogi kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada chabyan ka tayn krta haay۔aardar ka ayk by try aym nwda main zayada tr M-1 kyza aur aym chailda pwaintrza par hawskta hay ، swaiay jra kay alawha

Question: drkht par mbny dayta dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey haf myn kwdangh kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: haf myn kwdangh ayk lchkdar dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm hay jo drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha astamal krta hay ، jsay haf myn try kay nam sy jana jata hay ، un ki mwjwdghy ki tadd ki bnyad par harwf ko mtghyr lmbaiy kay kwda tfwyzu karnay kay liay۔yha aam tawr par fail kmpryshn aur dayta transmyshn jesay ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta haay۔ yahan ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat hay keh haf myn kwdangh drkhtwn par mbny dayta dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey kis tarah kam krty haay: tadd tjzayha: haf myn kwdangh main pehla kdm frykwiynsy tjzayha karna haay۔an pt dayta ، jesay tykst dstawyza ya harwf ki trtyb۔har krdar ki frykwinsy ghnty ki jati hay ، aur ayk frykwynsy tybl tyar kya jata haay۔ haf myn drkht ki tamyr: frykwynsy tybl sy hr krdar ko abtdaiy tawr par ayk pty nwda kay tawr par smjha jata haay۔ sab sy kam tadd waly do nwdas ko ayk niay waldyn nwda main mlaya jata hay ، js main mshtrkha tawr par ayk niay waldyn kay nwda main mil jata haay۔tadd do bchwn kay nwdas ki tadd ka mjmwaha hony ki wjha say۔ yeh aml is wkt tak dharaya jata hay jab tak keh tamam nwdas ko ayk snghl main jwra nahin diya jata hay

Question: mlhakha mytrks kya hay aur yeh ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye kis tarah astamal hawta haay؟
Answer: ayk mlhakha mytrks do jhaty mytrks ka astamal karty hoey ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay ka ayk aam tarykha haay۔yha ghraf main amwdy kay mabyn talkat ki ayk kmpykt aur mwsar nmaindghy fraham krta haay۔ ayk mlhakha mytrks main ، mytrks ki ktaaryn aur kalm ghraf kay amwdy ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔mytrks ka hr syl do amwdy kay darmiyan ayk knaray ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har syl main zakhyrha shuda kymt isi tarah kay amwdy kay mabyn knaray ki mwjwdghy ya adm mwjwdghy ki nshandhay krty haay۔ is kay liye do aam nktaha nzar hain

Question: aap ghraf par by ayf ays (chwraaiy ki pehli tlash) alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karain ghay؟
Answer: kesi ghraf par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: ayk abtdaiy wrtyks ka antkhab kryn: ayk aysa abtdaiy had ka antkhab karain js sy aap by ayf ays trywrzaal ko shrwa karna chahti hayn۔ dayta dahanchay ko bhatr bnaiyn: amwdy hasaay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk ktaar bnaiynmlahazaha karnay kay liye aur ayk syt ya srny ka dwrha karnay waly amwdy ko tryk karnay kay liay۔ abtdaiy wrtyks ko tlash kryn: abtdaiy wrtyks ko ktaar main shaml karain aur isy mlahazaha ki tarah nshan zad kryn۔ktaar ka samnay۔ amwdy prwsys karain (jysay ، isy prnt karain ya is par kuch aapryshn anjam dyn)۔

Question: ayk lahakha srny kya hay aur yeh kesay mfyd haay؟
Answer: ayk lahakha srny ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ki trtyb shuda saf ko mhafwza krta haay۔yha asal strngh ، jesay pytrn mmasal ، strngh srch ، aur sab sy tawyl aam pryfks kmpywtyshn par astrngh sy mtalkha karwaiyan anjam denay ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔ lahakha srny ki tamyr kay l the ، asal tar pehlay lahakha ki ayk saf main tbdyl hawjata haay۔har lahakha asal tar kay ayk mkhsawsa andayks sy shrwa hony wala aur akhttam tak phylta haay۔as kay bad lahakha lahakha srny bnanay kay liye lght kay mtaabk trtyb diya jata haay۔ lahakha srny main kiy ayply kyshnza aur fwaid hayn: strngh srch: ayk lahakha srny kay sath ، aap mؤsar tarykay sy kesi nmwnha ya asal tar kay andr astrngh tlash krsktay hayn۔trtyb shuda lahakha srny par bainry srch ya dyghr mwsar tlash alghwrthm ka astamal krkay ، aap

Question: haysh tybl main haysh tsaadm kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk haysh tybl main ، haysh tsaadm is wkt hawta hay jab bnyady saf main ayk hi andayks ya balty ka do mkhtlf chabyan nkshha bnaiyn۔chwnkha haysh kay afaal mkhtlf chabyan kay liye ayk hi haysh wylyw pyda krsktay hain ، lhazaa zayada tr amly mnzarnamwn main tsaadm naghzayr hawtay hain ، khasa tawr par jab chabyan ki tadad baltywn ki tadad sy kahain zayada bray hawty haay۔ haysh kay tsaadm ko snbhalnay kay liye do aam hakmt amly: alyhadha zanjyrwn kay sath: sathalyhadha zanjyr ، haysh tybl main hr balty main ayk lnkda lst ya kuch aur dayta dahanchha shaml hay js main ayk hi andayks main haysh haysh ko ayk sy zayada klydy kymt kay jwraay zakhyrha karnay kay l. hayn۔jb tsaadm hawta hay tou ، is andayks main mwjwdha zanjyr main niy klydy kdr ki jwray ko shaml kya jata haay۔as tarah ، mtadd akdar ayk dusray ko awwr rait kyay baghair ayk hi andayks main mhafwza ki jaskty hayn۔ksy tlash ya bazayaft kay doran ، mtalwbha klyd kdr ko tlash karnay kay liye mnasb zanjyr ka sfr kya jata hay

Question: khud ko mnzam karnay ki fharst dayta dahanchay ka kam kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: khud tnzaym sazay ki fharst ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo khud bkhwd rsaiy ki tadd ki bnyad par apnay anasar ki tnzaym nw krta haay۔khwd tnzaym sazay ki fharst ka hadf mhangha kamwn ki tadad ko kam krkay ، jesay anasar ki tlash ya bazayaft karnay kay zaryaha ksart sy rsaiy waly anasar tak rsaiy ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔ anasar ko khud tnzaym sazay ki fharst main mnzam karnay kay liye mkhtlf hakmt amly hayn۔yhaan do mshtrkha nktaha nzar hayn: mntkl sy samnay (aym ty ayf): mww tw frnt hakmt amly main ، jab bhi kesi ansar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay (tlash ya bazayaft) ، isy fharst kay samnay main mntkl krdya jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh haal hi main tak rsaiy haasal karnay wala ansar hamyshha fharst kay sr par rahay gha۔aysa karnay sy ، aksar rsaiy haasal karnay waly anasar aahastha aahastha mhaaza ki taraf brahtay hain ، js sy tlash ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔taham ، is hakmt amly sy yeh frzu kya gaya hay keh mstkbl main rsaiy ka nmwnha haalyha mazuy tak rsaiy kay nmwnha sy mshabhat kray gha۔ transpwza: transpwza hakmt amly is khyal par mbny hay js nay haal hi main rsaiy haasal ki haay۔

Question: dahyr dayta dahanchay main kam sy kam ansar ki tlash main wkt ki pychydghy kya haay؟
Answer: dahyr dayta dahanchay main kam sy kam ansar ki tlash main wkt ki pychydghy mstkl wkt hay ، O (1)۔ayk kam sy kam hayp main ، kam sy kam ansar hamyshha rwt nwda par mhafwza kya jata hay ، jo isy aasany sy kabl rsaiy aur bazayaft krta haay۔dahyr kay saiza sy ktaa nzar ، aap mstkl wkt main kam sy kam ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye braha rast rwt nwda tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔ yeh kam sy kam ansar ki mstkl wkt ki bazayaft hayp dayta dahanchay ki ayk aham khsawsayt hay aur is ki ayk wjha haay۔trjyhay ktaar main mwsar aapryshn aur alghwrthm ko chhant raha haay۔dyghr karrwaiywn ki wkt ki pychydghy ، jesay andraj aur hazaf karna ، dahyr kay mkhsawsa nfaza par mnhasar hay ، aam tawr par O (lagh N) sy la kar O (n) tak bdtryn sawrt main ، jahan N dahyr main anasar ki tadad haay۔.yha kabl ghwr hay keh kam sy kam ansar ko hatanay kay bad hayp praprty ko brkrar rkhna (aam tawr par haypaiyfai ya dwbarha haypaiyfai kay aml kay zaryaay) azuafy wkt ki zurwrt praskty hay ، lekin kam sy kam ansar ki asal bazayaft khud mstkl wkt ka aml haay۔

Question: ayk sply try kya hay aur isy kis tarah astamal kya jata haay؟
Answer: ayk sply try ayk khud ko aydajst karnay wala bainry srch drkht hay jo anasar kay rsaiy kay andaza ki bnyad par khud ko tnzaym nw krta haay۔as ka mksad ksart sy rsaiy waly anasar ki jra kay kryb lakr ، mstkbl tak rsaiy kay awkat ko kam krkay ، ayk splyngh kay drkht main ، jab bhi kesi ansar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay (tlash ، dakhl ki jati hay ya hazaf) ko bhatr bnana hay ، is ki jra main laya jata haay۔ghrdshwn aur tnzaym nw ki karrwaiywn ki ayk syryza kay zaryaay drkht۔as aml ko "chhraknay" kaha jata haay۔chhraknay wala aapryshn drkhtwn kay dahanchay ko jrawn main rkhnay kay liye aydajst krta hay ، js sy bad main hony wali karrwaiywn main rsaiy aasan aur tyza tr hawjaty haay۔ asplaingh aapryshn aam tawr par tyn aham akdamat par mushtamil hawta haay: zagh zagh ya zaygh zagh ghrdsh: agar rsaiy haasal shuda ansarayk pwtay ya pwtay ka bchha hay ، is ko jra tak lanay kay liye ghrdshwn ka ayk slslha anjam diya jata haay۔as main ya tou zaygh zagh ghrdsh shaml hawskty hay ya

Question: askyp ghraf dayta dahanchha kya hay aur yeh kesay kam krta haay؟
Answer: askyp ghraf ayk ahatmaly aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo mtwazan srch drkht ki tarah mwsar tlash aur asharyha sazay ki salahaytwn ko fraham krta hay lekin ayk aasan sakht kay sath۔yha mwsar tlash aur andraj kay kamwn ko haasal karnay kay l Sk askyp lstwn aur bainry srch drkhtwn kay fwaid ko jwrata haay۔ ayk askyp ghraf prtwn kay ayk drjha bndy par mushtamil hawta hay ، js main hr nwdas ki ayk mnslk fharst hawty haay۔askyp ghraf ki nchly prt dayta dahanchay main mwjwd tamam anasar ki trtyb shuda mnslk fharst haay۔awnchy prtyn nchly prt kay kuch anasar par antkhaby tawr par "askypngh" kay zaryaha tkhlyk ki jati hain ، js main shart kt tshkyl dytay hain jo tyza tr tlashy ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ yahan askyp ghraf kis tarah kam krta haay: tamyraty: abtdaiy tawr par ، tamam anasar ko askyp ghraf ki nechay ki prt main dakhl kya jata hay ،trtyb shuda lnkda fharst tshkyl dyna۔har nwda main ayk klydy kdr ki jwray hawty hay aur is main ayk ya zayada farwrda pwaintr hawsktay hain jo aghly aaly prt main nwdas ki taraf asharha karty hayn۔ askp knkshn: aaly prtwn ko bnanay kay liye ، ayk ahatmal ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔nchly prt main hr nwda kay l a ، ayk skay tas taay krta hay keh aya is main aghly aaly prt ka farwrda pwaintr hawgha۔farwrda pwaintr rkhnay ka amkan kam hawta hay kywnkha prt unchi hawty haay۔as aml sy ayk askyp knkshn pyda hawta hay jo nchly prt main mtadd anasar ko nzarandaza krta hay ، js sy tyza tr tlashy ki ajazat mlty haay۔

Question: astyk aur ktaar kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk astyk aur ktaar dono lkyry dayta dahanchay hain jo anasar ko astwr aur mnzam karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔astyk aur ayk ktaar kay darmiyan bnyady frk is main hay keh kis tarah anasar ko shaml kya jata hay aur hr dahanchay sy hataya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main mkhtlf rsaiy kay nmwnwn aur tarza aml ka ntyjha hawta haay۔ astyk: ayk astyk aakhry un frst aaؤt (LIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krta hay ، is ka mtalb hay khaaakhry ansar dakhl kya gaya pehla ayk hay js ko hata diya jata haay۔ ansar ko isi sray sy shaml aur hata diya jata hay ، jsay aksar astyk ka "awpr" kaha jata haay۔ astyk par anjam di janay wali karrwaiywn ko aam tawr par "psh" kaha jata hay (ansar shaml karty hoey ansar shaml karty hayn۔astyk kay awpry hasaay myn) aur "pap" (astyk sy upar waly ansar ko hatana)۔ ayk astyk ko amwdy dahanchay kay tawr par dekha jaskta hay ، jahan niay anasar ayk dusray kay upar khraay hayn۔phalay sy bahar (FIFO) asawl ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh pehla ansar dakhl kya gaya pehla ansar hay js ko hata diya jata haay۔ ansarwn ko ayk sray main shaml kya jata hay ، jsay aksar ktaar ka "akby" ya "pychhay" kaha jata hay ، aur dusray sy hata diya jata haayakhttam ، jsay aksar ktaar ka "frnt" kaha jata haay۔ ktaar main anjam di janay wali karrwaiywn ko aam tawr par "ankyw" kaha jata hay (as main ansar shaml karty hain

Question: fynwk drkht kya hay aur is ka astamal kesay hawta haay؟
Answer: ayk fynwk drkht ، jsay bainry andayksda try (BIT) bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk aysa dayta dahanchha hay jo mؤsar tarykay sy sabkha rkm kay swalat ko anjam denay aur kesi saf main anfrady anasar ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha mthark saf main anasar ki mjmway rkm ki ghnty aur is main trmym karnay ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔ fynwk kay drkht main ayk srny par mbny nmaindghy hay jo bainry drkht kay dahanchay ko astamal krty haay۔yha kesay kam krta haay: srny nmaindghy: fynwk try ko saiza N+1 ki ayk saf kay tawr par pysh kya jata hay ، jahan N asal saf ka saiza haay۔andayks 0 main azuafy ansar 0. bainry drkhtwn kay dahanchay kay tawr par shrwa kya gaya haay: fynwk drkht main hr ansar asal saf main anasar ki ayk had sy msawy haay۔khasa tawr par ، fynwk drkht main andayks I kay ansar kay liye ، asal saf main anasar ki isi rynj [i - lsone (i) + 1 ، i] hay ، jahan LSONE (i) kam sy kam ahamyt ki kdr haay۔i.prefix SUM hasab ktab ki bainry nmaindghy: asal saf main dyiay gaye andayks I tak anasar kay sabkha rkm ki ghnty karnay kay liye ، aap fynwk kay drkht ko andayks I sy is kay waldyn kay nwdas tak mntkl karty hain jab tak

Question: ghnty ki trtyb alghwrthm kesay kam krty haay؟
Answer: ghnty ki tarah ayk mwsar alghwrthm hay jo ayk marwf had kay sath addywn kay zakhyray ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha un pt srny main hr ansar kay liye taay krkay kam krta hay ، anasar ki tadad jo is sy chhwtay hayn۔an ghntywn ki bnyad par ، yeh hr ansar ko apni sahayha trtyb shuda pwzayshn main rkhta haay۔ yahan ghnty ki tarah kam krta haay: ghnty ka mrhalha: un pt srny ko abwr karain aur hr anwkhay ansar kay wakaat ko ghnyn۔an ghntywn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye "ghnty srny" ya "frykwiynsy srny" kay nam sy ayk maawn srny bnaiyn۔

Question: ayk prwghram lkhyn takha malwm kya jaskay keh bainry ka drkht bainry tlash ka drkht haay۔
Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya bainry try bainry srch try (by ays ty) hay ، aap mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: ayk mddghar fnkshn ki wzuahat karain ، aaiyay is ko IS_BST_UTIL kehty hain ، jo bainry try nwda lyta hay ، is kay sath kam aza kam aur zayada sy zayada kymt bhi hay keh nwda ki kymt haay۔andr aana chahaiay۔yha fnkshn bar bar janch pratal krta hay keh agar drkht main hr nwda by ays ty praprty ko mtamin krta haay۔ IS_BST_UTIL fnkshn myn: bys kys: agar nwda koi nahin hay tou ، sch waps lwtyn (ayk khaly drkht ayk drst BST smjha jata haay) ۔kyk karain agar nwda ki kymt is kay andr hay tou chyk krynkm sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar kay zaryaha byan krdha had۔aghr yeh had sy bahar hay tou ، ghalat ko waps kryn۔ mwjwdha nwda ki kymt kay tawr par tazaha trien zayada sy zayada kymt kay sath baien bchay kay liye IS_BST_UTIL par kal karain (baiyn sbtry main mwjwd tamam akdar mwjwdha nwda sy chhwty honi chahaiyn)۔mwjwdha nwda ki kdr kay tawr par tazaha trien kam sy kam kymt (daiyn sab try main mwjwd tamam akdar mwjwdha nwda sy zayada honi chahaiyn)۔ agar dono bar bar aanay wali kalyn drst lwt aaien tou ، drst lwt aaien ، is bat ki nshandhay karty hain keh mwjwdha nwda par jraay hoey sab try ayk drst bst.finally haay۔، ayk rypr fnkshn bnaiyn ، aaiyay isy kehty hain `

Question: yeh chyk karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn keh aya diya gaya ghraf ayk drkht hay ya nhayn۔
Answer: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh diya hoa ghraf ayk drkht hay ya nahin ، aap ghraf par ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (DFS) trywrsl anjam dy saktay hain aur drj zayl shraita ki janch krsktay hayn: tamam amwdywn ko balkl ayk bar mlahazaha kya jana chahaiay۔aghr kesi bhi had sy zayada bar mlahazaha kya jata hay tou ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh ghraf main ayk chkr mwjwd hay ، aur yeh drkht nahin hawskta haay۔ ghraf ko mkml tawr par jrana chahaiay ، is ka mtalb hay keh kesi bhi had sy shrwa hony waly ، aap ko dusray tamam amat tak phanchnay kay kabl hona chahaiay۔aghr mnktaa ajzaaa mwjwd hain tou ، yeh drkht nahin hawskta haay۔ day ayf ays trywrsl kay doran pychhay kay knaray nahin hona chahaiay۔pchhla knaray ayk knaray hay jo day ayf ays trawrsl main apnay ayk aabaؤ ajdad sy ayk chwty ko jwrata haay۔aghr aap ko pchhlay knaray ka samna karna prata hay tou ، is ka mtalb hay keh yahan ayk chkr hay ، aur yeh drkht nahin hawskta haay۔ azaghr main ayk msaal ka prwghram hay jo chyk krta hay keh agar dyiay gaye ghraf ka drkht hay tw: kapy kwda

Question: fbwnyky hayp dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: shrwa sy fbwnyky dahyr par aml draamd karna ayk pychydha kam haay۔as main mtadd dayta dahanchay ka antzaam karna aur mkhtlf hayp khsawsayat ko brkrar rkhna shaml haay۔taham ، main aap ko fbwnyky hayp dayta dahanchay aur is kay kamwn ka ayk aaly stahay jaizaha fraham krskta hawn۔ ayk fbwnyky hayp ayk ksm ka hayp dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar karrwaiywn ki hamayt krta hay jesay andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur kam sy kam ansar ko msthakm mstkl main nkalta haay۔wktyha drkhtwn kay amtzaaj aur fbwnyky hayp sy mnfrd khsawsayat ka ayk mjmwaha astamal krkay is karkrdghy ko haasal krta haay۔ ayk fbwnyky hayp ki klydy khsawsayat main shaml hayn: mn hayp praprty: hayp main hr nwda mn hayp praprty ko pora krta hay ، js main kaha gaya hay keh is ki klyd ko pora kya jata haayhar nwda main sy is kay waldyn ki klyd sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawta haay۔an drkhtwn ko "mn-hayp aardarda drkht" ya mhazu "fbwnyky drkht" kaha jata haay۔ "daghry praprty: dahyr main hr nwda main ayk daghry hawty hay ، jo is main bchwn ki tadad ki nmaindghy krty haay۔

Question: lahakha srny dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: lahakha srny dayta dahanchay ko nafza karna ayk pychydha kam hay ، lekin main aap ko is main shaml akdamat ka ayk aaly stahay jaizaha fraham krskta hawn۔ ayk lahakha srny dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ka ayk trtyb shuda saf haay۔ayk lahakha srny ki tamyr kay liye ayk amwmy nktaha nzar yeh haay: un pt strngh kay tamam lahakha pyda kryn۔ lahakwn ko lght kay lhaaza sy trtyb dyn۔# un pt strngh lahakha kay tamam lahakha pyda karain = [s [i:] kay liye rynj (lyn ((())))] # blt un `trtyb dyiay gaye fnkshn lahakha_aray = trtyb shuda (rynj (lfykss (lfykss) ka astamal karty hoey lazmi tawr par lfyks ko trtyb dyn۔)) ، klydy = lymbdaa ayks: lahakha [x])

Question: by+ drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: by+ try dayta dahanchay ko nafza karna ayk pychydha kam hay js main nwda dahanchha ، andraj ، hazaf karnay ، aur tlash kay kamwn smyt mkhtlf awaml par mhatata ghwr karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔by+ drkht kay mkml nfaza main mtadd ajzaaa aur tarykay shaml hayn۔yhaan ayk aaly stahay jaizaha hay keh kis tarah by+ try kam krta hay aur is main shaml kuch aham ajzaaa shaml hayn: by+ drkht ka dahanchha: by+ drkht nwdas par mushtamil hay ، js main jra nwda ، andrwny nwdas ، aur pty nwdas shaml hayn۔ hr nwda main ayk mkrrha salahayt hay awrayk mkhsawsa tadad ki chabyan aur is sy mtalkha akdar ya pwaintrza۔ nwda dahanchha: dakhly nwdas main klydy kymt kay jwraay aur bchwn kay nwdas kay pwaintr hawtay hayn۔twazan brkrar rkhnay kay liye kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada chabyan

Question: dayta dahanchha kya haay؟
Answer: dayta ka dahanchha kmpywtr ki mymwry main dayta ko mnzam aur astwr karnay ka ayk tarykha hay takha is tak mwsar andaza main rsaiy ، trmym aur is par karrwaiy ki jaskay۔yha ayk mntaky nmaindghy fraham krta hay keh kis tarah dayta ka ahatmam kya jata hay aur is par aapryshn kis tarah anjam dyiay jasktay hayn۔aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kmpywtr sains main bnyady tamyraty blaks hain aur mkhtlf kmpywtyshnl msail ko hal karnay kay liye zurwry hayn۔ dayta dahanchay dayta anasar kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat karty hain ، js sy mwsar astwryj ، bazayaft aur dayta ki hayra phyry ki ajazat hawty haay۔wha mkhsawsa alghwrthm ya ayply kyshnza ki zurwryat ki bnyad par dayta ko mnzam karnay aur un ka nzam karnay kay mkhtlf tarykay fraham karty hayn۔har aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki apni khsawsayat hawty hain ، jesay keh yeh aadad wa shmar ko astwr aur bazayaft krta hay ، is ka wkt aur jghha ki pychydghy ، aur mkhsawsa karrwaiywn kay l its is ki mnasbyt۔ mkml tawr par astamal shuda dayta dahanchay main safyn ، lnkda fharstyn ، astyk ، ktaaryn ، drkht ، ghraf ، haysh shaml hayn۔myzayn ، dahyr ، aur bohat kchh۔har aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kay apnay fwaid aur tjarty aafs ، aur antkhab ka antkhab hawta hay

Question: astyk kya haay؟as ki ayk msaal dyn keh isy kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk astyk ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jo aakhry un frst aaؤt (LIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh astyk main daala janay wala aakhry ansar pehla ayk hay js ko hataya jata haay۔as ko plytwn kay dahyr kay tawr par swchyn ، jahan aap nay aakhry plyt upar rakhi hay woh pehla hay js ko aap atar saktay hayn۔ ayk astyk

Question: ktaar kya haay؟as ki ayk msaal dyn keh isy kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk ktaar ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jo pehlay un frst aaؤt (FIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha ayk hakyky zandghy ki ktaar ya lain ki tarah kam krta hay ، jahan ktaar main shaml hony wala pehla shkhsa pysh kya jata hay ya is par karrwaiy ki jati haay۔ ayk ktaar main do aham karwaiyan hawty hayn: ankyw: is kay pychhay (akhttam) main ansar shaml krta haayktaar۔ daykyw: ktaar kay samnay (aaghaza) sy ansar ko hatata hay aur lwtata haay۔ un bnyady karrwaiywn kay alawha ، ayk ktaar aam tawr par dyghr aapryshnza fraham krty hay jesay jhankna (as ko hataiay baghair samnay waly ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liay) aur aaisty fytyaghr ktaar

Question: bainry drkht kya haay؟
Answer: bainry ka drkht ayk ksm ka drjha bndy kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay js main hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchwn hawtay hain ، jnhyn baien bchay aur dien bchay kay tawr par jana jata haay۔bainry drkht ko "bainry" kaha jata hay kywnkha hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchay hawsktay hayn۔ bainry drkht myn: hr nwda main safr ، ayk ، ya do bchay hawsktay hayn۔ js trtyb main bchwn ko nwda main shaml kya jata hay woh aham haay۔baiyn bchay ko aam tawr par dien bchay sy pehlay shaml kya jata haay۔ nwda kay bchay alag alag hawtay hain ، yany wahan koi daplykyt bchay nahin hawtay hayn۔

Question: bainry tlash ka drkht kya haay؟
Answer: bainry srch try (by ays ty) ayk ksm ka bainry drkht hay js main ayk azuafy praprty hawty hay jo isy tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn kay l efficient mwsar bnaty haay۔bainry tlash kay drkht main ، hr nwda kay liye ، is kay baien sab try main mwjwd tamam nwdas ki kdr is ki kymt sy kam hay ، aur is kay dien sab try main mwjwd tamam nwdas ki kymt is ki kdr sy zayada haay۔ bainry srch try ki klydy khsawsayat hayn: praprty ko aardar krna: bainry srch try main kesi bhi nwda kay l its ، is kay baien sab try main mwjwd tamam nwdas nwda sy kam akdar rkhtay hain ، aur is kay dien sab try main mwjwd tamam nwdas nwda sy zayada akdar rkhtay hayn۔daplykyt akdar ki ajazat dyn۔har nwda ki ayk anwkhy klydy kdr hawty haay۔ bainry srch try ki aardarngh praprty mwsar tlash kay kamwn ki ajazat dyty haay۔jb kesi khasa kdr ki tlash karty ho tou ، bainry srch try ko hr ayk main kdrwn kay sath hadf ki kymt ka mwazanha krkay abwr kya jaskta hay

Question: haysh tybl kya haay؟
Answer: ayk haysh tybl ، jsay haysh nkshha bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar andraj ، hazaf karnay aur anasar ki bazayaft fraham krta haay۔yha hayshngh kay tsawr par mbny hay ، jo mstkl tawr par awstaa kys ki karrwaiywn ki ajazat dyta hay ، js sy bray mkdar main dayta ko snbhalnay kay liye anthaaiy mwsar hawta haay۔ ayk haysh tybl main ، dayta anasar ko haysh tybl srny namy ayk saf ki tarah dahanchay main mhafwza kya jata haay۔srny ko haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey trtyb diya gaya hay ، jo un pt dayta ko haysh kwda kay nam sy jana jata haay۔haysh kwda ko srny sy anasar ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye andayks kay tawr par astamal kya jata haay۔ haysh tybl ki klydy khsawsayat yeh hayn: haysh fnkshn: a

Question: ayk ghraf kya haay؟
Answer: ayk ghraf ayk ghair lkyry dayta dahanchha hay js main nwdas ka ayk syt (jsay wrtysys bhi kaha jata haay) aur nwdas ko jwranay waly knarwn ka ayk syt hawta haay۔ayk ghraf ka astamal mkhtlf ashyaa ya adarwn kay mabyn talkat ya rabtawn ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ ayk ghraf myn: nwdas: nwdas ghraf main mwjwd adarwn ya ashyaa ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔har nwda main ayk anwkha shnakht knndha ya kdr sy wabstha hawskta hay

Question: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash aur ghharaiy ki pehli tlash main kya frk haay؟
Answer: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) aur ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) do bnyady ghraf trawrsl alghwrthm hain jo mkhtlf tarykwn sy ghraf kay zaryaay tlash karty hain ya tlash karty hayn۔by ayf ays aur day ayf ays kay mabyn bnyady frk is trtyb main hay js main trywrsl kay doran nwdas ka dwrha kya jata haay۔ brydaryda frst tlash (by ayf ays): by ayf ays ayk dyiay gaye swrs nwda sy shrwa hawta hay aur ayk hi staha par tamam nwdas ki khwj krta hay (yany ، tamam hamsayha mmalkmwjwdha nwda) aghlay drjay par janay sy phalay۔ is main nwdas ka dwrha karnay kay liye ayk ktaar dayta dahanchha astamal kya jata haay۔makhza nwda ko ktaar main shaml kya jata hay ، aur phir swrs nwda kay prawsywn ko ktaar main shaml kya jata haay۔yha aml is wkt tak jary rhata hay jab tak keh tamam nwdas ka dwrha nah kya jaiay۔ by ayf ays is bat ki zumant dyta hay keh yeh sab ka dwrha krta hay

Question: dahyr kya haay؟
Answer: kmpywtr sains main ، ayk dahyr drkht par mbny ayk khsawsay dayta dahanchha hay jo hayp praprty ko mtamin krta haay۔ayk dahyr ko aksar bainry dahyr kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay ، jo ayk mkml bainry drkht hay jahan hr nwda ya tou kam sy kam praprty ya zayada sy zayada hayp praprty ko mtamin krta haay۔as nwda ki kymt is kay bchay nwdas ki akdar sy kam ya is kay brabr haay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، kam sy kam kymt hamyshha hayp ki jra main rhaty haay۔ myks hayp

Question: zayada sy zayada dahyr aur ayk mnt kay dahyr kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: zayada sy zayada dahyr aur ayk mnt kay dahyr kay darmiyan frk dahyr kay andr anasar ki trtyb main hay aur js praprty ko woh mtamin karty hayn: zayada sy zayada dahyr: zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، hr waldyn kay nwda ki kymt zayada hawty hay

Question: trjyhay ktaar kya haay؟
Answer: trjyhay ktaar ayk tjrydy dayta ki ksm hay jo anasar ko un sy wabstha trjyhaat kay sath mhafwza krty haay۔yha bhi aysa hi hay

Question: srkh syaha drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk srkh syaha drkht ayk khud mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay jo kwaad wa zuwabta kay ayk syt kay zaryaay twazan brkrar rkhta haay۔as ka nam drkht kay hr nwda ko tfwyzu krdha rngh kay nam par rakha gaya hay ، jo srkh ya syaha hawskta haay۔srkh syaha drkht is bat ki zumant dyta hay keh drkht ki awnchaiy laghrthmk rhaty hay ، js sy mwsar tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnata haay۔ srkh rngh kay drkht ki klydy khsawsayat mndrjha zayl hayn: hr nwda ya tou srkh ya syaha haay۔ jra ka nwda haay۔hamyshha syaha۔ hr pty (nwl nwda) syaha haay۔ agar nwda srkh hay tou ، is kay dono bchay syaha hayn۔ nwda sy is ki awlad kay ptay tak hr rastay main msawy tadad hawty hay

Question: tabkha ka drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk tabkha ka drkht ، jsay wkfha kay drkht kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk wrstail dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi srny kay wkfwn ya tabkat ko mwsar astfsar aur ap dayt karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha khasa tawr par mkhtlf rynj par mbny swalat ko hal karnay kay l useful mfyd hay ، jesay saf main anasar ki ayk mkhsawsa had kay andr kam sy kam ، zayada sy zayada ، rkm ya dyghr mjmway kymt tlash krna۔ tabkha ka drkht srny ko nwdas ki ayk drjha bndy ki sakht main twra dyta hay ،jhaan hr nwda srny kay ayk tabkha ya wkfha ki nmaindghy krta haay۔drkht ki jra pori saf ki nmaindghy krty hay ، aur hr dakhly nwda ayk tabkha ki nmaindghy krta hay jo is kay bchwn kay tabkat ka athaad haay۔pty kay nwdas srny kay anfrady anasar ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ tabkha kay drkht kay pychhay klydy khyal yeh hay keh andrwny nwdas par hr tabkha kay liye antrmydayt kay ntaij ، jesay rkm ya kam sy kam kymt ko zakhyrha karna haay۔as sy pori safwn ko abwr karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair tabkat par mwsar swalat aur tazaha karywn ki ajazat mlty haay۔

Question: fynwk drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk fynwk drkht ، jsay bainry andayksda try (BIT) bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo mjmway tawr par mjmway rkm kay swalat aur anasar ki ayk saf kay baray main ap dayt ki hamayt krta haay۔yha pryfks sm srny ka ayk mtbadl fraham krta hay ، js main tazaha trien malwmat aur swalat dono kay liye O (n) wkt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ fynwk try mjmway rkm ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk hawshyar bainry nmaindghy ka astamal krta haay۔drkht ka hr asharyha saf main kesi ansar sy msawy hay ، aur hr andayks main zakhyrha shuda kymt anasar ki ayk mkhsawsa rynj ki mjmway rkm ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ fynwk drkht ki sakht bainry nmaindghy kay tsawr aur lwibt kay khyal par mbny haay۔، kay liye ، ، ، ، ، ، ، ، ، ، kay liye ، sadyn ، ، ، ، kay liay.

Question: AVL drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk aay wy ayl ka drkht khud sy mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay js ka nam is kay mwjdwn ، aydaylsn wylsky aur lyndas kay nam par rakha gaya haay۔yha nwdas ki tadad main lwghrthmk kay kryb apni awnchaiy ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay ، mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn ko ykyny bnata haay۔ ayk AVL drkht main ، hr nwda main ayk twazan ansar hawta hay jo is kay baien aur dien sbtryza ki blndywn kay darmiyan frk ki nmaindghy krta haay۔bylns ansar ya tou -1 ، 0 ، ya 1 hawskta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya sab try baltrtyb baien bhary ، mtwazan ، ya dien bhary haay۔ aay wy ayl kay drkht ki klydy mlkyt yeh hay keh hr nwda ka twazan ansar hona zurwry haay۔had [-1 ، 1]۔aghr kesi bhi mwka par bylns ansar is praprty ki khlaf wrzay krta hay tou ، drkhtwn kay twazan ko bhaal karnay kay liye ghrdshyn anjam di jati hayn۔ aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn main astamal hony wali char ksm ki ghrdshyn: baien ghrdsh: yeh aapryshn twazan ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay jab nwda dien bhary hawjata haay۔as main nwda kay dien bchay ko upar mntkl karna shaml hay ، js sy yeh niy jra bn jati hay ، jabky asal jra niy jra ka baien bchha bn jati haay۔ thyk ghrdsh: jab nwda baien bhary hawjata hay tou yeh aapryshn twazan ko bhaal karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as main nwda kay baien bchay ko upar mntkl karna shaml hay ، jabky isy niy jra bnana hay ، jabky

Question: lahakha drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk lahakha drkht ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ko mwsar andaza main nmaindghy krta haay۔yha aam tawr par pytrn mmasal aur strngh hayra phyry alghwrthm kay liye astamal hawta haay۔lmbaiy kay liye ayk lahakha drkht ki tamyr kay liye O (n) wkt aur jghha ki pychydghy ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ lahakha drkht drkht kay dahanchay main tkrary sy lahakha shaml krkay bnaya gaya haay۔drkht main hr knaray asal tar kay ayk hasa rising ay ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur jra sy pty kay nwda tak ka rastha ayk mkml lahakha ki nmaindghy krta haay۔knarwn ki pyrwy karty hoey ، hum kesi strngh kay wakaat ka sragh lghasktay hain ya do dawrwn kay mabyn sab sy tawyl aam sstrngh tlash krsktay hayn۔ lahakha drkht ka klydy faidha yeh hay keh yeh mwsar astrngh tlash aur pytrn mmasal ki ajazat dyta haay۔ayk nmwnha pysh karty hoey ، hum lahakha ko abwr krkay asal tar main is kay wakaat ki tlash krsktay hain

Question: ayk lahakha srny kya haay؟
Answer: ayk lahakha srny dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ka ayk trtyb shuda saf haay۔yha ayk lahakha drkht ka mtbadl dayta dahanchha hay jo isi tarah ki faalyt fraham krta hay lekin zayada kmpykt nmaindghy kay sath۔lahakha safwn ko aam tawr par strngh prwsysngh aur pytrn mmasal alghwrthm main astamal kya jata haay۔ ayk lahakha srny ki tamyr main pwaintrza ya andayks ki ayk saf tyar karna shaml hay jo dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ki abtdaiy pwzayshnwn ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as kay bad yeh lahakha un kay mtalkha zayly zakhyrwn ki bnyad par lght kay mtaabk trtyb diya jata haay۔ntyjay main lahakha srny mwsar tlash aur pytrn mmasal kamwn ki ajazat dyta haay۔ lahakha srny ka klydy faidha is ki sadghy aur kam mymwry awwr hayda hay jo lahakha drkht kay mkablay main haay۔

Question: ayk naghwar syt dayta dahanchha kya haay؟
Answer: ayk mtnazaaha syt dayta dahanchha ، jsay ywnyn ft dayta dahanchha bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo naghwar (ghyr awwrlypngh) sytwn kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yha mndrjha zayl aapryshnza ko mwsar andaza main anjam denay kay liye karwaiyan fraham krta haay: mykyt (x): ayk wahad ansar x.find (x) kay sath ayk nya syt tyar krta haay: x sy talk rkhnay waly syt kay nmainday (jsay jra bhi kaha jata haay) waps krta haay۔nmaindha ayk hay

Question: askyp lst kya haay؟
Answer: askyp lst ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi lnkda fharst ya mtwazan srch drkht ki tarah trtyb dyiay gaye trtyb main anasar ko zakhyrha karnay aur tlash karnay ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔as ki ayjad 1989 main wlym pgh nay mtwazan tlash kay drkhtwn kay mtbadl kay tawr par ki thi jo isi tarah ki karkrdghy ki khsawsayat pysh krty hay lekin aasan aml kay sath۔ ayk askyp lst main mnslk fharstwn ki mtadd prtwn par mushtamil hay ، jahan hr prt is kay nechay ki prt ka sab syt haay۔nychay ki prt asal trtyb shuda mnslk fharst hay js main tamam anasar shaml hayn۔awnchy prtwn main nchly prt sy anasar ka ayk hasaha hawta hay ، js main anasar ka ahatmal sy mntkhb kya jata haay۔awpry prt main sirf do anasar hawtay hain ، jo askyp lst main sab sy chhwtay aur sab sy braay anasar hayn۔ askyp lst kay pychhay klydy khyal yeh hay keh aaly prtyn ayksprys lyn kay tawr par kam krty hain ، js sy tyzay sy tlashy aur trywrsl ki ajazat hawty haay۔ayk prt main hr ansar main ayk farwrda pwaintr hawta hay jo aghly prt main is ansar ki aghly mwjwdghy ki taraf asharha krta haay۔aghr koi ansar kesi aaly prt main mwjwd nahin hay tou ، farwrda pwaintr nechay ki prt main aghly mwjwdghy par is kay upar jata haay۔ askyp lst main kesi ansar ki tlash kay l you ، aap upar ki prt sy shrwa karty hain aur anasar ko dien taraf jatay hoey ghzartay hain jab tak dien taraf harkt karty hawaap ko mtalwbha ansar mil jata hay ya kesi braay ansar tak phanch jata haay۔aghr aap kesi prt kay akhttam par phanch jatay hain tou ، aap nechay ki prt ki taraf brahtay hain aur tlash jary rkhtay hayn۔yha aml is wkt tak jary rhata hay jab tak keh ansar nahin mil jata hay ya

Question: khud twazan bainry tlash ka drkht kya haay؟
Answer: khud twazan bainry srch try ayk bainry srch try (by ays ty) hay jo khud bkhwd mtwazan dahanchay ko brkrar rkhta hay kywnkha anasar dakhl ya hazaf krdyiay jatay hayn۔ayk mtwazan by ays ty ykyny bnata hay keh drkht ki awnchaiy

Question: dwghna mnslk fharst kya haay؟
Answer: ayk dwghna mnslk fharst ayk lkyry dayta dahanchha hay jahan hr nwda main do pwaintr hawtay hayn: ayk pchhlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta hay aur dusra tslsl main aghlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta haay۔dayta ansar kay alawha ، dwghna mnslk fharst main hr nwda apnay pchhlay aur aghlay nwdas kay hawalay brkrar rkhta hay ، js sy dono smtwn main trawrsl ki ajazat mlty haay۔ dwghna mnslk fharst ka dahanchha mndrjha zayl haay: vbnetcopy kwdaynwda: - dayta: asal dayta: asal daytaya nwda main zakhyrha shuda kymt۔- pchhla: fharst main pchhlay nwda ka pwaintr/hawalha۔- aghla: fharst main aghlay nwda ka pwaintr/hawalha۔

Question: thwraa sa saf kya haay؟
Answer: thwraa sa srny ، jsay thwraa sa wyktr ya btsyt bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo bts ki ayk saf ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jahan hr ayk main do akdar main sy ayk hawskta haay: 0 ya 1. yeh kesi syt ki ayk kmpykt aur mymwry ki mwsar nmaindghy haay۔bwlyn akdar kay۔ yahan bt srywn kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: dahanchha: thwraa sa srny aam tawr par bts kay ayk mkrrha saiza ki saf kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay ، jahan hr sa bwlyn kdr ki nmaindghy krta haay۔bt srny ka saiza mtalwbha akdar kay mtalwbha syt ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye drkar bts ki tadad kay zaryaha taay kya jata haay۔

Question: bainry andayksda drkht kya haay؟
Answer: ayk bainry asharyha dar drkht ، jsay fynwk try kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar ko ap dayt karnay aur kesi saf kay sabkha rkm ka hasab lghanay ki mwsar andaza main mdd krta haay۔as sy mthark ya tghyr pzayr saf par mwsar karrwaiywn ki ajazat mlty hay jahan anasar ko lagh un kay wkt ki pychydghy main ap dayt ya un sy astfsar kya jaskta haay۔ yahan bainry andayksda drkhtwn kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: dahanchha: bainry andayksda drkht ko aam tawr par srny par mbny dayta dahanchay kay tawr par pysh kya jata haay۔as main bainry drkht ki tarah ka dahanchha astamal hawta hay ، jahan drkht ka hr nwda srny main anasar ki ayk had ki nmaindghy krta haay۔drkht main hr nwda ka andayks asal saf main anasar kay ayk sabkha mjmwaha sy msawy haay۔ aapryshn: tazaha kary: bainry andayksda drkht saf main anfrady anasar ki mwsar ap dayt ki hamayt karty hayn۔drkht ko abwr karnay aur isi tarah kay nwdas ko ap dayt karnay sy ، drkhtwn ki sakht ko srny main hony wali tbdylywn ki akasy karnay kay liye aydajst kya jata haay۔as aapryshn kay zaryaha anjam diya jaskta hay

Question: ayk wyrl tybl kya haay؟
Answer: ayk wyrl tybl ayk aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo msthakm saf ya trtyb par mwsar andaza main rynj kay swalat ki ghnty aur jwabat dyta haay۔yha bnyady tawr par is wkt astamal hawta hay jab srny ko ksart sy ap dayt nahin kya jata hay ، lekin mtadd swalat hain jn kay liye rynj par mbny swalat ka mwsar andaza main jwab denay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yahan wyrl tyblza kay baray main kuch aham nkat hayn: dahanchha:
